summary: FRONT DISK BRAKES OVERHEATED AND BECAME WARPED.  VEHICLE RARELY CARRIES FULL PASSENGER OR CARGO LOADS.  VEHICLE HAS NEVER PULLED A TRAILER. VEHICLE HAS UNDER 18,000 MILES ON IT WITH NORMAL DRIVING, SELDOM STOP AND GO.  FAILURE MAY CAUSE FAMILIES ON TRIPS WITH TRAILERS TO HAVE A CATASTROPHIC FAILURE OF THE BRAKING SYSTEM.   *NLM
